amendment.description: An amendment numbered 267 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to forbid funds from being used in violation of section 2635.702 of title 5, Code of Federal Regulations, related to the use of public office for private gain.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A090) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A090) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A090) offered by Mr. Krishnamoorthi.
